scripts.serve: yarn run build:all && yarn run analyze-bundles && ng serve
scripts.build:libraries: yarn run build:ng-list && yarn run build:wc-list
scripts.build:ng-list-demo: ng build --project ng-list-demo --stats-json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer ./dist/ng-list-demo/stats.json -m static -r ./dist/ng-list-demo/stats.html -O
scripts.build:ng-selectable-list-demo: ng build --project ng-selectable-list-demo --stats-json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer ./dist/ng-selectable-list-demo/stats.json -m static -r ./dist/ng-selectable-list-demo/stats.html -O
scripts.build:wc-list-demo: ng build --project wc-list-demo --stats-json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer ./dist/wc-list-demo/stats.json -m static -r ./dist/wc-list-demo/stats.html -O
scripts.build:wc-selectable-list-demo: ng build --project wc-selectable-list-demo --stats-json && npx webpack-bundle-analyzer ./dist/wc-selectable-list-demo/stats.json -m static -r ./dist/wc-selectable-list-demo/stats.html -O
scripts.build:applications: yarn run build:ng-list-demo && yarn run build:wc-list-demo && yarn run build:ng-selectable-list-demo && yarn run build:wc-selectable-list-demo
scripts.build:all: yarn run build:libraries && yarn run build:applications
